skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only design guidelines and implementation instructions. No executable code, scripts, network calls, file system access, or command execution capabilities. The skill provides behavioral guidance for generating frontend code.

content.value_statement: Generic AI-generated frontend code often lacks creative vision and memorable aesthetics. This skill guides Claude to create production-grade, visually striking interfaces with bold design choices, unique typography, and cohesive aesthetic direction.
actual_capabilities: Create production-grade frontend components and pages
Implement bold aesthetic directions with cohesive visual themes
Design with unique typography, color schemes, and motion effects
Build responsive layouts with creative spatial composition
Avoid generic AI aesthetics with intentional design choices
Add micro-interactions, animations, and visual polish
limitations: Does not generate backend code or server-side functionality
Does not integrate with design tools like Figma or Sketch
Does not perform accessibility audits or testing
Does not handle data fetching or state management patterns

use_cases.title: Build creative web components
use_cases.description: Create distinctive React, Vue, or vanilla JS components with unique aesthetics and polished animations.

use_cases.title: Prototype visual concepts
use_cases.description: Rapidly prototype visually striking interface concepts that avoid generic design patterns.

use_cases.title: Design landing pages
use_cases.description: Build memorable landing pages with creative layouts, typography, and motion effects.

prompt_templates.title: Basic component request
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the frontend-design skill to create a [component type] for a [use case]. Choose a [aesthetic direction] aesthetic with unique typography and cohesive color scheme. Include subtle animations and polished interactions.

prompt_templates.title: Complete page design
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the frontend-design skill to build a complete [page type] page. Commit to a bold [specific aesthetic] aesthetic. Include header, main content, and footer with consistent styling and deliberate visual hierarchy.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive dashboard
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the frontend-design skill to create a [dashboard/panel] interface. Balance information density with visual clarity. Add meaningful motion, clear typography hierarchy, and creative use of negative space.

prompt_templates.title: Refined minimal design
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the frontend-design skill to design a [interface type] with refined minimalism. Focus on precision, subtle details, perfect spacing, and restraint. The elegance should come from execution quality.

output_examples.input: Create a pricing card component with a luxury aesthetic
output: Generates pricing cards with refined typography, elegant spacing, and sophisticated color palette
Includes subtle hover effects and smooth transitions
Uses distinctive display fonts paired with refined body fonts
Applies gold/metallic accents against dark or cream backgrounds
Creates visual hierarchy that guides attention to key information

best_practices: Define a clear aesthetic direction before coding and commit to it fully throughout the design
Use CSS variables for consistent theming and easy customization across the interface
Focus on high-impact visual moments like page load animations rather than scattered micro-interactions
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto without intentional design reasoning
Applying predictable purple gradients or timid color schemes without creative commitment
Creating layouts that follow predictable patterns without spatial creativity or visual interest

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with React, Vue, vanilla HTML/CSS/JS, and other frontend frameworks. It focuses on design quality regardless of implementation technology.

faq.question: Can this skill create accessible interfaces?
faq.answer: The skill includes accessibility considerations but does not perform automated accessibility testing. Manual verification of accessibility compliance is recommended.

faq.question: How does this skill differ from standard code generation?
faq.answer: This skill explicitly avoids generic AI aesthetics by committing to bold, distinctive design directions with unique typography, creative layouts, and cohesive visual themes.

faq.question: Does this skill handle responsive design?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill includes responsive design considerations and creates interfaces that adapt across different screen sizes with thoughtful breakpoints.

faq.question: Can I request dark mode designs?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill supports both light and dark themes. You can specify your preference or let the skill choose based on the aesthetic direction.

faq.question: What makes designs produced by this skill distinctive?
faq.answer: Each design uses intentional typography choices, bold color commitments, creative spatial composition, and meaningful motion to avoid generic AI-generated aesthetics.
